meanings.sent1: The zebra with the stripiest coat stood out in the herd.
meanings.sent2: The tiger had the stripiest fur of all the animals in the jungle.
meanings.sent3: The stripiest snake in the exhibit seemed to be showing off its fashionable pattern.
meanings.sent4: Among all the contestants, her dress was the stripiest, making her the center of attention.
meanings.sent5: The stripiest candy cane was a delight to look at and even sweeter to eat.

meanings.sent1: This shirt is stripiest than the one I wore yesterday.
meanings.sent2: Out of all the ties, the blue one is the stripiest.
meanings.sent3: The stripiest pencil in the box seemed to be the favorite among the students.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork was the stripiest in the class, showcasing her attention to detail.
meanings.sent5: The stripiest road in town led straight to the circus, inviting all to join the fun.

meanings.sent1: That is the stripiest dress I have ever seen!
meanings.sent2: The zebra at the zoo is the stripiest animal I've encountered.
meanings.sent3: The stripiest umbrella in the store caught everyone's eye with its vibrant colors.
meanings.sent4: Her painting was the stripiest of them all, earning her the first prize.
meanings.sent5: The stripiest flag fluttered proudly in the wind, representing the nation's history.
